title: Fragments, ca. 1775
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 40.5 cm (16 in.). Weft: 40 cm (15 3/4 in.). All edges cut. 
B. Warp: 40 cm (15 3/4 in.). Weft: 32 cm (12 1/2 in.). Left selvedge present. 
C. Warp: 17.5 cm (6 3/4 in.). Weft: 40 cm (15 3/4 in.). All edges cut. 
D. Warp: 6 cm (2 1/2 in.). Weft: 17.5 cm (6 3/4 in.). All edges cut. 
E. Warp: 76 cm (30 in.). Weft: 12 cm (4 3/4in.). All edges cut 
F. Warp: 75 cm (229 1/2in.). Weft: 11.5 cm (4 1/2 in.) All edges cut. 
G. Warp: 29 cm (11 1/2 in.). Weft: 19.5 cm (7 3/4 in.). Right selvedge present. 
H. Warp: 39.5 cm (15 1/2 in.). Weft: 12 cm (4 3/4 in.). All edges cut. 
I. Warp: 15.5 cm (6 in.). Weft: 13 cm (5 in.). All edges cut.
description: Nine fragments of a chinoiserie design with people, buildings with bells, rocks and bridges. All of the fragments together do not give a full unit of the pattern. In blue on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-75-a/i.
